document.discussion_title: ASQ Announces 2016 International Team Excellence Award Process... - SourceBioFly
document.topic_text: ASQ Announces 2016 International Team Excellence Award Process… 2015 Gold Level Winner Movistar-Telefonica de Argentina Participating in the competition is one of the most motivating events — not just for winning — but for talking to other teams and learning from them – Mathias Gadda Thompson, quality manager for Telefónica. Milwaukee, Wisconsin (PRWEB) April 25, 2016 ASQ, the world’s largest network of quality resources and experts, has announced 36 global teams from nine countries as finalists in the 31st annual International Team Excellence Awards. The teams will be part of the live case study presentations May 16–18, at ASQ’s annual World Conference on Quality and Improvement at the Wisconsin Center in Milwaukee, Wis. Teams representing various industries including manufacturing, service, health care, government and education will vie for the ASQ Gold, Silver and Bronze level awards. Winners will be announced during an awards ceremony on Wednesday, May 18, and will serve as benchmarks of organizational excellence in all industries for years to come. The finalists’ projects showcase creative, innovative solutions and organizational cost savings. Conference attendees can observe team project presentations that demonstrate the real-life application of quality tools that help companies save millions by creating…
